page.title: 01Panfield
page.content: This area consists mainly of arable farmland. The main residential areas are{Bocking}and{Panfield.}Both were mentioned in the original Domesday Book. The river{Pant}flows through the area and joins the{Blackwater}in { {Bocking.}The{B1053}road, running from {Braintree}to{Saffron Walden,}links { {Panfield}with the neighbouring villages of{Shalford, Wethersfield } and{Finchingfield.} There are a number of old farm houses and thatched cottages and some modern houses, mainly in {Panfield. {Panfield Hall}was built as a hospital for the{Great Priory,}which no longer exists. In recent years{Towerlands {Equestrian Centre}was built. It provides many sports activities.
